comment.author: 10380224@N08
comment._content: The date would suggest it was 23 June 1911 which was one day after the Coronation of King George V. Since this is almost certainly a picture of the Coronation procession I would think the date refered to the day it was processed or published. Many other copies of this and other pictures in the series are available on the Internet, all taken from the same position but with the procession moved.

comment.author: 31580040@N04
comment._content: This is the Royal Procession which takes place on the day following the coronation.

comment.author: 31580040@N04
comment._content: The carriage appears to contain a Maharaja and the following cavalry is Indian.

comment.author: 8110957@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called ANYTHING GOES ENGLAND,VINTAGE PHOTOS,POSTCARDS,EPHEMERAetc..., and we'd love to have this added to the group!
